author: potuz
content: Added a quick one with the analysis for 2 colluding proposers against a builder and a proposer and a builder colluding against another proposer. https://ethresear.ch/t/payload-boosts-in-epbs/18769 This is assuming PTC + payload boosts. We can guarantee builder safety and 1-slot reorg resistance for adversaries that can split arbitrarily the view and hold up to 20% of the total stake.
